segments.text: I notice the boy balancing on the stool, his hand deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, her hand outstretched, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t lose his balance—he’s really reaching far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to go wrong at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it or if the woman will finally turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR
